meanings.definition: Not provided with food or drink
meanings.sent1: The uncatered guests at the party were hungry and thirsty.
meanings.sent2: The picnic was uncatered, so everyone brought their own snacks.
meanings.sent3: The uncatered teddy bear at the tea party felt left out.
meanings.sent4: The uncatered garden with wilting plants looked like a forgotten oasis.
meanings.sent5: The uncatered classroom smelled of stale sandwiches and warm soda.

meanings.definition: Not attended to or taken care of
meanings.sent1: The uncatered car in the garage had a flat tire and dusty windows.
meanings.sent2: The uncatered emails in the inbox kept piling up unanswered.
meanings.sent3: The uncatered puppy chewed on shoes to get attention.
meanings.sent4: The uncatered project was like a ship adrift at sea without a captain.
meanings.sent5: The uncatered houseplants wilted from lack of water and sunlight.
